text: Searched around for the perfect tablet for my 3 year old. After testing tablets in stores and reading reviews online the kids fire stood out. The 2 year warranty and free year access to kids content is amazing. The soft foam case provides coverage for drops- the battery life is good for a few hours of play time and the charge time is quick after. For the money this tablet cannot be beat - only minor issue ive noticed is having connection issue with networks at times but this is can be fixed by disconcerting and reconnecting to network. Overall this is a Best Buy for the money- tablet can also be used for adults when you exit the free time app.
title: Great Tablet for Kids
